title: Oversee Site Clearing and Grading
description: A developer is starting a new project and must oversee the initial site preparation.

tasks.description: Verify that all necessary erosion control measures are in place before work begins, as required by local regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The site is compliant with environmental regulations.

tasks.description: Monitor the work of the excavation contractor to ensure they are clearing the site and grading it according to the approved civil engineering plans.
tasks.expected_outcome: The site work is proceeding according to plan.

tasks.description: Review and approve the contractor's invoices for the site work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Invoices are approved for payment after verifying the work was completed.
